name: Reconnaissance - Search Closed Sources (T1597)
description: Detects attempts to access or enumerate closed or internal sources during reconnaissance. This includes internal network shares, private repositories, or credential/configuration storage.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.name:(powershell.exe OR cmd.exe OR git.exe OR robocopy.exe OR net.exe) AND (process.args:(*net view* OR *net use* OR *\\* OR *Invoke-WebRequest* OR *git clone* OR *svn* OR *.git* OR *.config* OR *password* OR *credential*))
